definitions.definition: To boast ; to talk with excessive pride about what one has, is able to do, or has done; often as an attempt to popularize oneself.
examples: to brag of one’s exploits, courage, or money

main_definition: ( intransitive , often with of ) To boast ; to talk with excessive pride about what one has, is able to do, or has done; often as an attempt to popularize oneself.
